languages.text: "Ты не представляешь, что это такое — когда самый важный в твоей жизни человек, ушедший навсегда, вдруг вновь звучит в твоей голове! Как я могла не попытаться — хотя бы попытаться дотянуться до нее?!"

traits.locale_text: "Ты не представляешь, что это такое — когда самый важный в твоей жизни человек, ушедший навсегда, вдруг вновь звучит в твоей голове! Как я могла не попытаться — хотя бы попытаться дотянуться до нее?!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "You don't know what it's like — the most important person in your life, who's now gone forever, suddenly starts talking to you inside your head! How could I not try to reach her? I had to!"
languages.original_text: "Ты не представляешь, что это такое — когда самый важный в твоей жизни человек, ушедший навсегда, вдруг вновь звучит в твоей голове! Как я могла не попытаться — хотя бы попытаться дотянуться до нее?!"

traits.locale_text: "You don't know what it's like — the most important person in your life, who's now gone forever, suddenly starts talking to you inside your head! How could I not try to reach her? I had to!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You don't know what it's like — the most important person in your life, who's now gone forever, suddenly starts talking to you inside your head! How could I not try to reach her? I had to!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You don't know what it's like — the most important person in your life, who's now gone forever, suddenly starts talking to you inside your head! How could I not try to reach her? I had to!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You don't know what it's like — the most important person in your life, who's now gone forever, suddenly starts talking to you inside your head! How could I not try to reach her? I had to!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “你不明白那是什么感觉——你生命中最重要的人，已经永远离开的那个人，突然出现在你脑子里，开始和你说话！我怎么可能不去试着寻找她呢？我只能那么做！”
languages.original_text: "You don't know what it's like — the most important person in your life, who's now gone forever, suddenly starts talking to you inside your head! How could I not try to reach her? I had to!"

traits.locale_text: “你不明白那是什么感觉——你生命中最重要的人，已经永远离开的那个人，突然出现在你脑子里，开始和你说话！我怎么可能不去试着寻找她呢？我只能那么做！”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «No lo entiende... La persona más importante de mi vida, ya perdida para siempre, ¡empieza a hablar en mi cabeza! ¿Cómo no iba a intentar comunicarme? ¡Tenía que hacerlo!».
languages.original_text: "You don't know what it's like — the most important person in your life, who's now gone forever, suddenly starts talking to you inside your head! How could I not try to reach her? I had to!"

traits.locale_text: «No lo entiende... La persona más importante de mi vida, ya perdida para siempre, ¡empieza a hablar en mi cabeza! ¿Cómo no iba a intentar comunicarme? ¡Tenía que hacerlo!».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「あなたにはわからないでしょうね…人生で最も大切な人が永遠にいなくなってしまったと思ったら、突然頭の中で語り始めたのよ！彼女に呼びかけないことなどできると思う？そうしなければならなかったの！」
languages.original_text: "You don't know what it's like — the most important person in your life, who's now gone forever, suddenly starts talking to you inside your head! How could I not try to reach her? I had to!"

traits.locale_text: 「あなたにはわからないでしょうね…人生で最も大切な人が永遠にいなくなってしまったと思ったら、突然頭の中で語り始めたのよ！彼女に呼びかけないことなどできると思う？そうしなければならなかったの！」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr wisst nicht, wie es ist, wenn ... die wichtigste Person in Eurem Leben, die Person, die für immer von Euch ging ... wenn diese Person plötzlich mit Euch spricht. Wie hätte ich sie ignorieren können? Ich musste sie erreichen!"
languages.original_text: "You don't know what it's like — the most important person in your life, who's now gone forever, suddenly starts talking to you inside your head! How could I not try to reach her? I had to!"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr wisst nicht, wie es ist, wenn ... die wichtigste Person in Eurem Leben, die Person, die für immer von Euch ging ... wenn diese Person plötzlich mit Euch spricht. Wie hätte ich sie ignorieren können? Ich musste sie erreichen!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Vous ne savez pas ce que c'est... Imaginez que la personne la plus chère à votre cœur ait disparu pour toujours et qu'elle se mette subitement à murmurer à votre esprit ! Comment aurais-je pu résister à l'envie de lui parler ? C'était plus fort que moi ! »
languages.original_text: "You don't know what it's like — the most important person in your life, who's now gone forever, suddenly starts talking to you inside your head! How could I not try to reach her? I had to!"

traits.locale_text: « Vous ne savez pas ce que c'est... Imaginez que la personne la plus chère à votre cœur ait disparu pour toujours et qu'elle se mette subitement à murmurer à votre esprit ! Comment aurais-je pu résister à l'envie de lui parler ? C'était plus fort que moi ! »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Anlamıyorsun. Hayatındaki en önemli insan, ölüp gitmişken aniden zihninde seninle konuşmaya başlıyor! Ona ulaşmadan nasıl durabilirdim ki? Yapmak zorundayım!"
languages.original_text: "You don't know what it's like — the most important person in your life, who's now gone forever, suddenly starts talking to you inside your head! How could I not try to reach her? I had to!"

traits.locale_text: "Anlamıyorsun. Sonsuza dek dönmeyecek olan hayatındaki en önemli insan aniden zihninde seninle konuşmaya başlıyor! Nasıl ona ulaşmadan durabilirdim ki? Yapmak zorundayım!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
